00024 #ifndef __L4__SYS__ARCH_ARM__LINKAGE_H__
00025 #define __L4__SYS__ARCH_ARM__LINKAGE_H__
00026 
00027 #if defined(__PIC__) \
00028     && ((__GNUC__ < 4) || (__GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 2))
00029 # define PIC_SAVE_ASM    "str r10, [sp, #-4]!  \n\t"
00030 # define PIC_RESTORE_ASM "ldr r10, [sp], #4    \n\t"
00031 # define PIC_CLOBBER
00032 #else
00033 # define PIC_SAVE_ASM
00034 # define PIC_RESTORE_ASM
00035 # define PIC_CLOBBER ,"r10"
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #ifdef __ASSEMBLY__
00039 #ifndef ENTRY
00040 #define ENTRY(name) \
00041   .globl name; \
00042   .p2align(2); \
00043   name:
00044 #endif
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #define L4_FASTCALL(x)  x
00048 #define l4_fastcall
00049 
00055 #define L4_CV
00056 
00057 #ifdef __PIC__
00058 # define L4_LONG_CALL
00059 #else
00060 # define L4_LONG_CALL __attribute__((long_call))
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #endif /* ! __L4__SYS__ARCH_ARM__LINKAGE_H__ */
